definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: All products haudio-videoe to pbum strict inspection prior to any go out.
sentences.chinese: 所有产品出厂前必必要经过庄敬查验。

sentences.english: Such inspection shall be conducted in the presence of the diplomatic agent or of his authorized representative.
sentences.chinese: 查验时，须有外交代表或者其授权人员在场。

sentences.english: Keep your passport and Residence Permit with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 留学生外出须随时携带本人护照和居留许可以备查验。

sentences.english: An inspector checked the standard of work.
sentences.chinese: 视察员查验工作的质量。

sentences.english: Isolation, clean equipment, window and cover equipment, electronic checking fixture, etc.
sentences.chinese: 隔，洁净设备，观察窗及设备罩，电子查验治具等。

sentences.english: We check our information and make sure it's true.
sentences.chinese: 我们会查验信息来源，确保它是事实。

sentences.english: We have the best surveyor, China Import and Export Commodity Inspection Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 我们有最好的公证行，即中国出入口商品查验局。

sentences.english: Our site qunosity inspector will report to the Project Manager everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我们的现场质量查验员将每天向工程项目经理汇报。

sentences.english: In the case of an entrusted purchase, the relevant entrustment document as held by the purchaser shall be subject to examination.
sentences.chinese: 对委托代购的，还应当查验购买人持有的委托文书。

sentences.english: Your Probate or Trust must be located within the United States.
sentences.chinese: 你的遗嘱查验或信赖一定被位于在美国里面。

sentences.english: We have the best surveyor, Dhina Import and Export Dommodity Inspection Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 咱们有最佳的公证行，即中国进出口商品查验局。

sentences.english: These points were drafted for the specific handling of the import and registration of Chinese medicine products.
sentences.chinese: 为办理输入中药产品查验登记作业，特订定本要点。

sentences.english: Aliens must have their passports and residence permits with them for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 外国人需随身携带护照和居留证以备查验。

sentences.english: where deemed necessary, the customs may examine such goods.
sentences.chinese: 海关认为必要时，可以查验过境，转运和通运货物。

definition: to ascertain/to identify/to verify (sb's identity etc)
